Content:
Things ive tried:

Using normal seat (makes crotch numb)

Carving the seat (can't carve straight)

Seatconcepts (causes sit bone pain that goes to my legs, and yes I gave time for it to break in)

Seatconcepts + Coleman maddog (same thing with sit bone pain but less)

Rubber mesh thingy (Good, but slightly numb)

And I'm already a cyclist (20 mile trips) and the reason my road bike seat is from a cruiser is because of sit bone issues.

My only guess right now is to maybe find a way to mount a rebel 250 seat onto it as I had no issue with that

So stock seat foam density is good but formed wrong + makes me sit too high despite being a tall rider

I am not in a position right now to spend $500 on a seat right now and I feel robbed with spending $350 on the seatconcepts (this was well before I knew they would take it back if two weeks didnt work)

Title: Desperate to find a comfortable seat (CRF250L)
Author: vyquad
